title: The White Gauntlet
description: Excerpt from The White Gauntlet:Marion Wade possessed all the conditions to merit such exalted admiration. She was high-born, beautiful, and bright-haired. She was alone in a wood.It did not detract from the interest of the Situation, that She was mounted on a white horse, carried a hawk on her hand, and was fol lowed by a hound.
author: Thomas Mayne Reid
